question: In some countries, more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the house or building they live in.What are the reasons for this? How can people research this?
text: Living place plays a major role in  everyone's life and its past is much more essential to know.In many countries,peoples are willing to know about the past of the place they reside in.There is a plethora of purpose behind it as well as there are other ways to find out the history using government official records as well as using advanced technology features.

Firstly,people tend to know about the physical infrastructure of the place .This is due to knowing the quality of materials used to construct.In recent days, the building can not able to withstand   natural disasters but it is exceptional for old buildings.For example,the place where I reside was constructed by a grandfather with  quality  materials and nothing was affected during last week's earthquakes.In addition,people are passionate to know about ancestors.It helps them to know about their own history.

There is a variety of sources available to know about the information we stay.People can make use of details from their neighbours.It is the simplest way to gain information .For example,my building's historical information was collected from a next-door person.In addition,we could use government records to do research .In the government office,we can register to get to know about the historical details we reside in.For instance,I received a details about my building after registering with the government bodies.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article a may not be required with the plural noun details in this sentence. Consider removing the article, or changing the noun to singular.
